Header.title: The path to reach your net zero target
Header.paragraph: Tracific accelerates the participation of companies in the fight against climate change

About.paragraph: Carbon credits have too long been associated with greenwashing, we want to ensure on the seller side the  “integrity, transparency and traceability” of all entries made and on the buyer side that carbon credits are only used to neutralize hard-to-abate, unavoidable emissions. Carbon offsetting is not a silver bullet for tackling climate change. But when done right, it is an important part of an effective climate or carbon management strategy. Businesses should follow a hierarchy of actions. They need to measure and understand their footprint, reduce and avoid what emissions they can and then look to offset, or balance, those residual emissions that they cannot reduce?
Why: 18 years experience in nature based projects and mobility
Networking in the EU and Asia

Features.title: 1. Origination
Features.text: Decarbonization projects in the donain of forests, industrial projects or raw material recyclcing

Features.title: 2. Rigorous selection
Features.text: We apply a due diligence process on the projects selected to control and get the best carbon credits, which means you don’t waste money on bad investments or put your reputation at risk.

Features.title: 3. Audit
Features.text: We are working with world class standard (Verra, Gold Standard, RED++) in order to third-party check our projects

Features.title: 4. Lifetime Measure
Features.text: We are building a cloud-based platform connected to carbon reduction projects owners in order to find, track, trade carbon credits in order to ensure integrity, transparency and traceability of all entries made.
